snippet: Palace Malice, the winner of the 2013 Belmont Stakes, is retiring because of a bone bruise in his left hind leg.
abstract: Palace Malice, 2013 Belmont Stakes winner, will retire because of a bone bruise in his leg; other horse racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Palace Malice, the winner of the 2013 Belmont Stakes, is retiring because of a bone bruise in his left hind leg.

headline.main: Palace Malice, 2013 Belmont Winner, Is Retiring
